Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 63rd overall pick, by New York (N) in 2012...
Traded from New York (N) to Colorado on 2/4/2014 (Going to COL: P P. Johnson. Going to NYN: P J. Zimmerman)...
Injured on 8/21/2015 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Colorado to Washington on 4/1/2016 (Going to COL: 2B Z. Alberti. Going to WSH: P B. Huggins, P P. Johnson, CF M. Taylor, P R. Blackmer)...
Had first career hit on 4/15/2016, off Drew Hutchinson (LAN)...
Earned first career win on 4/15/2016...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (N) on 2/22/2022 to a 3-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
